links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} Stirling2(n, k)*(1-(-1)^k)/2*2^(n-k). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 26 2003G.f.: sum(k>=0, x^(2*k+1)/prod(i=0..2*k+1, 1-2*i*x ). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jan 06 2013G.f.: x/( G(0)-x^2 ) where G(k) = x^2 + (4*x*k-1)*(4*x*k+2*x-1) - x^2*(4*x*k-1)*(4*x*k+2*x-1)/G(k+1); (recursively defined continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jan 06 2013
mathematica: Table[Sum[StirlingS2[n, k]*(1-(-1)^k)/2*2^(n-k),{k,0,n}],{n,0,20}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 06 2014 after Vladeta Jovovic *)Table[(BellB[n, 1/2] - BellB[n, -1/2]) 2^(n-1), {n, 0, 20}] (* _Vladimir Reshetnikov_, Nov 01 2015 *)
author: _R. H. Hardin_
